name: Rhy
appearance: Robed in river-stitched blues, hair threaded with eelbone charms. Her voice carries the steady cadence of the tide.
character: Solemn and careful, placing ritual above expedience; she listens more than she speaks.
skills: Channel reading by ripple and reed
talents: Hearing hymns within the Engine's pulse
Calming riots with cadence and prayer
Keeping water clean with subtle weirs
dreams: Keep the leviathan sleeping and the city afloat
Convert the Black Net to tithe and atone
Compose a hymn that seals the red tide for good
secrets: The heartstone whispers a name she will not repeat
Once used stormglass in secret to scry a drought
Keeps a token from the Ferryman wrapped in eel-skin
